Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

The agents of the projected regency of Senhora Januária, hand in hand with the fallen party and with the elected President, have kindled civil war in this Province; and wishing the Provincial Assembly to impose Dr. Marciano Pereira Ribeiro upon Your Excellency for this purpose. However, as we prepare to undertake this arduous but necessary mission, my friend Senhor Pe. Manuel Francisco de Andrade, moved by patriotism and by sincere friendship to Your Excellency

The respect and pure friendship that I have long consecrated to Your Excellency

May God keep Your Excellency  
Porto Alegre, March 11, 1836.  
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir  
Diogo Antonio Feijó — Regent of the Empire.

On sheet 1r. of the document.
